name: An Unstable World (N0i3ody)
description:
This is a submission for Ludum Dare 49

For more details please have a look at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/an-unstable-world

Controls

  • Camera is moved via WASD
  • Camera is rotated by moving the mouse while pressing the right mouse button
  • DNA Cards are selected and dragged via left mouse click.
